column4: yeah my old box doesn't seem to support usb booting. and i can't get the cd drive to boot anything. last ditch effort is netboot. don't think the nic/mobo/bios combo is going to allow it
alas, i have nothing else which will read a pata drive :(
in fact i want to get this up and running to read another old pata drive from a system that's tits-up
